Class BlockStorageLocationUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.BlockStorageLocationUtil

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
@InterfaceStability.Unstable
 class BlockStorageLocationUtil
extends Object

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  BlockStorageLocationUtil.VolumeBlockLocationCallable
      Callable that sets up an RPC proxy to a datanode and queries it for volume location information for a list of ExtendedBlocks.

    • Method Detail

      • createVolumeBlockLocationCallables

        private static List<BlockStorageLocationUtil.VolumeBlockLocationCallable> createVolumeBlockLocationCallables(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                                                                                            Map<DatanodeInfo,List<LocatedBlock>> datanodeBlocks,
                                                                                            int timeout,
                                                                                            boolean connectToDnViaHostname,
                                                                                            org.apache.htrace.Span parent)
        Create a list of BlockStorageLocationUtil.VolumeBlockLocationCallable corresponding to a set of datanodes and blocks. The blocks must all correspond to the same block pool.
        Parameters:
        datanodeBlocks - Map of datanodes to block replicas at each datanode
        Returns:
        callables Used to query each datanode for location information on the block replicas at the datanode

      • queryDatanodesForHdfsBlocksMetadata

        static Map<DatanodeInfo,HdfsBlocksMetadata> queryDatanodesForHdfsBlocksMetadata(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                                                                       Map<DatanodeInfo,List<LocatedBlock>> datanodeBlocks,
                                                                       int poolsize,
                                                                       int timeoutMs,
                                                                       boolean connectToDnViaHostname)
                                                                         throws InvalidBlockTokenException
        Queries datanodes for the blocks specified in datanodeBlocks, making one RPC to each datanode. These RPCs are made in parallel using a threadpool.
        Parameters:
        datanodeBlocks - Map of datanodes to the blocks present on the DN
        Returns:
        metadatas Map of datanodes to block metadata of the DN
        Throws:
        InvalidBlockTokenException - if client does not have read access on a requested block

      • associateVolumeIdsWithBlocks

        static Map<LocatedBlock,List<VolumeId>> associateVolumeIdsWithBlocks(List<LocatedBlock> blocks,
                                                            Map<DatanodeInfo,HdfsBlocksMetadata> metadatas)
        Group the per-replica VolumeId info returned from DFSClient#queryDatanodesForHdfsBlocksMetadata(Map) to be associated with the corresponding LocatedBlock.
        Parameters:
        blocks - Original LocatedBlock array
        metadatas - VolumeId information for the replicas on each datanode
        Returns:
        blockVolumeIds per-replica VolumeId information associated with the parent LocatedBlock

      • convertToVolumeBlockLocations

        static BlockStorageLocation[] convertToVolumeBlockLocations(List<LocatedBlock> blocks,
                                                   Map<LocatedBlock,List<VolumeId>> blockVolumeIds)
                                                     throws IOException
        Helper method to combine a list of LocatedBlock with associated VolumeId information to form a list of BlockStorageLocation .
        Throws:
        IOException
